page.title: 07FAMILY LIFE
page.content: From our survey it seems most people get up about 7.30am very few watch the fairly new introduction of breakfast television even though many people are retired. Most couples shop locally for small items nearly every day.Few of these families eat meat every day soup and egg dishes are favourites. They seldom try foreign dishes (continental or Indian) only the odd venturesome couple will try any thing new! Most couples had changed in one respect, in that they had a snack at lunchtime rather than the traditional main meal,the main meal being taken between 6 and 8 o'clock Most then watched television. They all thought Tenterden had adequate amenities for them. Gardening was a favourite hobby and some played bridge.
